contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHUNO | image = | city = [[Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes]], [[Mexico]] | area = [[Aguascalientes]] | branding = Magia 101 | slogan = Más música | airdate = | frequency = 101.7 FM | format = Top 40 / Back Tracks | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = UNO = Number One | former_callsigns = | owner = Radio Grupo Mexico | webcast = | website = http://www.radiogrupo.com.mx/xhuno/ | affiliations = }} '''XHUNO''' is an English top 40 music [[radio station]] that serves the state of [[Aguascalientes]]. Every Sunday, this station airs [[American Top 40]] hosted by [[Ryan Seacrest]]. ==References== * [http://www.radiogrupo.com.mx/xhuno/ Official website] <br clear=all> {{Aguascalientes Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xhuno}} [[Category:Regional Mexican radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Aguascalientes]] [[Category:Media in Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
